entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
